description.name: Drill Chuck Keyed 1,5-13mm B12
description.long_desc:
Drill Chuck for universal use on stationary box column drill and hand-operated corded and cordless drills. Impact-resistant key-type drill chuck with key. With through-hole for clockwise and counterclockwise rotation.


Technical Data



  • Clamping Range: 1.5 - 13 mm

  • Mount Taper Size: B12
description.short_desc:
Drill Chuck for universal use on stationary box column drill and hand-operated corded and cordless drills. Impact-resistant key-type drill chuck with key. With through-hole for clockwise and counterclockwise rotation.


Technical Data



  • Clamping Range: 1.5 - 13 mm

  • Mount Taper Size: B12
description.description:
Drill Chuck for universal use on stationary box column drill and hand-operated corded and cordless drills. Impact-resistant key-type drill chuck with key. With through-hole for clockwise and counterclockwise rotation.


Technical Data



  • Clamping Range: 1.5 - 13 mm

  • Mount Taper Size: B12

description.long_desc:

  • Drills afiixed without key

  • Suitable for drills 2-13 mm

description.name: Chuck for drill 2-13 1/2(metal)
description.long_desc:
• Handle made of high quality steel resistant to mechanical damages
  • Clatters made of cemented carbide provide longer life of device.
  • Outer cover is knurled, it enables fast screwing without slippage, even in thick gloves
  • Handle is equipped with so-called "click-stop" - it additionaly enables to block the grip
  • Handle has standard fastening 1/2" - 20UNF - suitable for majority of drills hammers or when using adaptor with hammer drills.
  • Suitable drills 2-13 mm
description.short_desc:
• Handle made of high quality steel resistant to mechanical damages
  • Clatters made of cemented carbide provide longer life of device.

  • Handle is equipped with so-called "click-stop" - it additionaly enables to block the grip
  • Handle has standard fastening 1/2" - 20UNF - suitable for majority of drills hammers or when using adaptor with hammer drills.
  • Suitable drills 2-13 mm

  • Drills gripped without key
  • Head cover made of hardened steel
  • Suitable drills 1-16 mm
  • Affixing thread B18

  • Suitable drills 1-16 mm
  • Affixing thread B18
